entry.value: library(ggplot2)%%00010Time = as.Date(knime.in$"Time")%%00010mi = knime.in$"min"%%00010ma = knime.in$"max"%%00010Hashtag = knime.in$"Iteration"%%00010%%00010%%00010length(palette)%%00010%%00010clean_theme = theme(panel.background = element_blank(),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009plot.title = element_text(size=20, face="bold", colour = "black"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009panel.border = element_rect(color = "black", linetype = "solid", fill = "transparent"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009axis.title.x = element_blank(),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009axis.title = element_text(size=14, face="italic", colour = "black"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009axis.text = element_text(size=12, face="italic", colour = "black"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009axis.text.y = element_blank(),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009legend.text = element_text(size=12, face="italic", colour = "black"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009panel.grid = element_blank()%%00010)%%00010%%00010#fill = scale_fill_manual(values=palette)%%00010%%00010legend = guides( fill = guide_legend(reverse=TRUE), color = guide_legend(reverse=TRUE))%%00010%%00010#lines = scale_colour_manual(values=palette)%%00010%%00010ribbons = geom_ribbon(aes(Time, ymin=mi, ymax=ma, group = Hashtag, color = Hashtag, fill = Hashtag))%%00010%%00010%%00010labels = labs(y = "Tweet Volume")%%00010ggplot() + ribbons + legend + labels%%00010#fill + lines ++ clean_theme

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
